mapper.select:
SELECT su.id,su.`loginname` AS username,su.`name` AS nickname,su.`email` AS mail,su.`state`,su.`organization_id` as orgId, so.`name` AS company,so.`address` AS location,so.`prov`,so.`city`,so.`contact` AS contacts,so.mobile,so.`telphone`, so.`bankName`,so.`bankCard`,so.`bankUser`,su.createdatetime as createTime FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN sys_organization so ON su.`organization_id` = so.`id` where so.orgType = 2 and su.state != 0
and su.`loginname` like CONCAT('%','${username}','%')
and su.`name` like CONCAT('%','${nickname}','%')
and so.`name` like CONCAT('%','${company}','%')
and so.`contact` like CONCAT('%','${contact}','%')
and su.`state` = #{state}
mapper.update: update sys_user set state =#{state},remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
